verses.name: Matthew 11:9
verses.text: But what went ye out for to see? A prophet? yea, I say unto you, and more than a prophet.

verses.name: Matthew 11:10
verses.text: For this is he, of whom it is written, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, which shall prepare thy way before thee.

verses.name: Matthew 11:11
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist: notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he.
